name: High Value Customers
description: Customers with total purchases over $1000 and active status
sqlQuery:
FROM customers
SHOW customer_name, note, email_subscription_status, location, orders, amount_spent
WHERE total_purchase_amount > 1000
AND customer_status = 'active'
ORDER BY updated_at

name: Mobile Users
description: Customers who primarily shop using mobile devices
sqlQuery:
FROM customers
SHOW customer_name, note, email_subscription_status, location, orders, amount_spent
WHERE device_type = 'mobile'
AND mobile_app_usage > 50
ORDER BY updated_at

name: Cart Abandoners
description: Customers who added items to cart but didn't complete purchase
sqlQuery:
FROM customers
SHOW customer_name, note, email_subscription_status, location, orders, amount_spent
WHERE cart_status = 'abandoned'
AND cart_updated_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
AND order_completed = 'false'
ORDER BY updated_at

name: Email Subscribers
description: Customers who have subscribed to email newsletters
sqlQuery:
FROM customers
SHOW customer_name, note, email_subscription_status, location, orders, amount_spent
WHERE email_subscription_status = 'subscribed'
AND marketing_emails_enabled = 'true'
ORDER BY updated_at

name: US Customers
description: Customers located in the United States
sqlQuery:
FROM customers
SHOW customer_name, note, email_subscription_status, location, orders, amount_spent
WHERE billing_country = 'US'
AND shipping_country = 'US'
ORDER BY updated_at

name: Lapsed Buyers
description: Customers who bought before but haven't purchased in 3 months
sqlQuery:
FROM customers
SHOW customer_name, note, email_subscription_status, location, orders, amount_spent
WHERE last_purchase_date < DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH)
AND total_orders > 0
ORDER BY updated_at

name: VIP Customers
sqlQuery:
FROM customers
SHOW customer_name, note, email_subscription_status, location, orders, amount_spent
WHERE lifetime_value_percentile >= 95
AND vip_status = 'true'
ORDER BY updated_at

name: Recent Customers
description: Customers who made a purchase in the last 30 days
sqlQuery:
FROM customers
SHOW customer_name, note, email_subscription_status, location, orders, amount_spent
WHERE last_purchase_date >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)
AND order_status = 'completed'
ORDER BY updated_at
